metadata.description: When four-less-than "super" villains - Whirlwind, 8-Ball, Humbug and Freezer Burn-skip bail and team up to rob the penthouse apartment of a wealthy publisher, they get more than they bargained for. Misty Knight and Colleen Wing are on the case. Unfortunately, so are a host of villains and assassins looking to recover what was stolen.
metadata.name: Daughters Of The Dragon
